title: I NEED HELP... MY ACCOUNT WAS DELETED
body: Someone help me please! I don't know what happened ! I just wrote my username and password as usually and the game asked me for a new summoner name- so i did it - and suddenly i end up with a new account 1 level...( THIS ONE ) i want my accound back so.. if someone know what happened please tell me what to do........

replies.body: Let's make sure you're logging onto the right account!  Hit us up directly through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account recovery team will help figure out what's going on.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
